TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MeasureSpecMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of the member.
Docs.remarks:
Enumerates values returned by the following:
and taken as a parameter of the member.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.MeasureSpecMode AtMost = int32(-2147483648)

summary.para: Measure specification mode: The child can be as large as it wants up to the specified size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.MeasureSpecMode Exactly = int32(1073741824)

summary.para: Measure specification mode: The parent has determined an exact size for the child. The child is going to be given those bounds regardless of how big it wants to be.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.MeasureSpecMode Unspecified = int32(0)

summary.para: Measure specification mode: The parent has not imposed any constraint on the child. It can be whatever size it wants.
